title: Clinical Practical Skills Enhancement: Cross-Cultural Online Collaboration Competency Development for Prospective Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and experience with online collaborative tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three communication barriers in cross-cultural online collaboration and develop resolution strategies
Collaboratively develop mathematics educational materials using Slack, Zoom, and other collaboration tools
Conduct peer evaluations by applying feedback techniques that account for cultural differences in online environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
